1) Addie Joss Portrait Sweet Cap back PSA3 asking $150 - SOLD
2) Hughie Jennings Portrait Piedmont SGC 30.  Really nice card, feel like this one is closer to a 3 asking SOLD
3) Dots Miller Sweet Cap back SGC 60 super nice! asking $80 - SOLD

Shipping included in price.  Paypal f/f preferred.  Please send PM if you have any questions
Thanks,
